verses.text: \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \w of|strong="H6144"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w Ar|strong="H6144"\w* \w of|strong="H6144"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* laid \w waste|strong="H7703"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* silent: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wall \w of|strong="H6144"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w* \w in|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* silent.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* house \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w gone|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Nabo, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Medaba, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* hath howled: ton \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w* \w shall|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* shaven.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* are \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*: \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tops \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* houses, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*.

Hesebon \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* Eleale, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Jasa. \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w well|strong="H3651"\w* appointed men \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* howl, \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* howl \w to|strong="H5704"\w* itself.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* flee unto Segor \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w heifer|strong="H5697"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w three|strong="H7992"\w* years old: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ascent|strong="H4608"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Luith \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* Oronaim \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w lift|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* Nemrim \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w desolate|strong="H4923"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w* \w away|strong="H3615"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w spring|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* faded, \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* greenness \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w perished|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* greatness \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* work, \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* visitation \w also|strong="H6213"\w*: \w they|strong="H3651"\w* shall lead \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* torrent \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* \w is|strong="H4124"\w* gone \w round|strong="H5362"\w* about \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*: \w the|strong="H0853"\w* howling thereof unto Gallim, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* unto \w the|strong="H0853"\w* well \w of|strong="H1366"\w* Elim \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* thereof.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Dibon \w are|strong="H1775"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w bring|strong="H7896"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Dibon: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* flee \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.
